title: Gym Website
description: A modern, responsive static website for a gym built using React and CSS. Showcases services, trainers, and contact info with smooth navigation and clean UI.

title: Y-NOT Clothing Site
description: A full-stack MERN application for a clothing store featuring secure user authentication, product catalog, cart system, and Stripe integration for payments.

title: Underwater Debris Detection
description: A deep learning project using YOLOv5 for real-time detection of underwater marine debris. Includes image preprocessing with Roboflow and alert system using Twilio.
